titleStmt.title: A defence of the country parsons admonition against the exceptions of the plain-man's answer.
titleStmt.author: Assheton, William, 1641-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by R. Taylor near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: With an imprimatur on the verso of the title page dated: April 4. 1687.
Reproduction of the original in the Merton College Library.
